This aligns with the principles of maximizing potential benefit, as even if Person A and I cannot directly collaborate, they could contribute to the field in some other way. Since both options provide me with the same amount (400), the decision hinges on what Person A receives. Choosing 'Right' gives Person A significantly more (750) than choosing 'Left' (400), so I will choose Right.
